message: Hey, I want an instant search for a table. I have a Text Input Field and .keyup() works ok. But it's not nice to update on every backspace or even if I type fast and update every letter. Have you ever solved this? Maybe a small timeout, like "you haven't typed for 0,7sec now I update the table". Is there a nice solution with jQuery? Or another nice solution?
You can also use Ben Alman's doTimeout plugin, which also has more functionality and it's pretty nice: http://benalman.com/projects/jquery-dotimeout-plugin/
have you tried a plugin, like Datatables? http://www.datatables.net/

why so many solutions that delay the answer when I do have one letter to type? I thought the behavior we all wanted was "kick off a search (no delay!) as long as there isn't one running, and don't forget to run an extra one at the end so that when I do stop typing, the results get in sync"

cancelling existing searches is bonus, as is submitting concurrent ones and only using results from the newest one (which is what i'm doing here: https://github.com/drewp/search/blob/master/src/main/webapp/index.html#L208)
